ADRESS.STREET: Number and name of the street

HOME.TITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Name, Company name, Organisazation code, Address...

TRANSLATION.TITLE: Translation
TRANSLATION.DO_NOT_SPLIT_WORDS: Do not split sentences in multiple words translated individually
TRANSLATION.TRANSLATE_PIPE: Text translated with the translate pipe. This is dynamically translated on language changes.
TRANSLATION.TRANSLATE_INSTANT: Text translated with the method translateService.instant(). This is not dynamicly translated on language changes.

TRANSLATE_GET.TRANSLATE_GET_1: First text translated with the method translateService.get().
TRANSLATE_GET.TRANSLATE_GET_2: Second text translated with the method translateService.get().

TRANSLATION.TRANSLATE_PARAMETERS: Text translated with multiple parameters : my first is {{ param1 }}, my second is {{ param2 }}.

TRANSLATE_NUMBER.ZERO: Text translated in singular and plural: I don't have any apple.
TRANSLATE_NUMBER.SINGULAR: Text translated in singular and plural: I have one apple.
TRANSLATE_NUMBER.PLURAL: Text translated in singular and plural: I have {{ number }} apples.

TRANSLATION.ALWAYS_TRANSLATE: Always translate the new labels : do not leave any hardcoded text.
TRANSLATION.KEY_NAMING: To name keys, use uppercase and underscore. Always start with the application name, and at least include the containing component. Ex: CUSTOMER.HOMEPAGE_MESSAGE.LANGUAGE_TITLE
TRANSLATION.KEY_NAMING_COMMON: For reccuring texts, put them in the COMMON category. Ex: COMMON.BACK

TYPOGRAPHY.TEXT_ELLIPSIS_CONTENT: Long text ellipsis that is need on table when resizing so that it doesn't show on next column
